abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Education Sector Development
            Project - APL Phase Two for Lesotho will finance the
            construction of new primary schools, the expansion of
            existing secondary schools, and a new one hundred bed hostel
            facility for male and female students at Thaba Tseka
            Technical Institute. As the exact locations for the new
            schools were not identified at the time the project was
            being prepared, the exact numbers and situations of affected
            persons are not addressed in this framework. The
            resettlement policy framework covers: the principles and
            objectives concerning resettlement preparation and
            implementation; land acquisitions; eligibility criteria
            project affected persons; a review of the legal framework;
            methods of valuing affected assets; organizational
            procedures for the delivery of entitlements; descriptions of
            the process for preparing and approving resettlement plans,
            of the implementation process, the grievance redress
            mechanisms, funding arrangements, and consultation
            mechanisms; and monitoring arrangements.
